name: Barrister Jean-Paul Mbarga
bio: With over 25 years of experience, Barrister Mbarga is recognized as one of Cameroon's leading business lawyers. A graduate of the University of Yaoundé and the Sorbonne, he has supported many companies in their growth.
education: PhD in Business Law - Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne
Master in Business Law - Université de Yaoundé II
Certificate in International Arbitration - ICC Paris

name: Barrister Aminata Ndiaye
bio: Barrister Ndiaye specializes in civil and family law. Her empathetic approach and legal rigor make her a highly appreciated lawyer by her clients. She has resolved more than 300 complex family cases.
education: Master 2 in Private Law - Université de Yaoundé II
Specialized Higher Studies Diploma in Family Law - Université de Dakar
Training in family mediation - Geneva Mediation Institute

name: Barrister François Kamga
bio: An expert in criminal law with 18 years of experience, Barrister Kamga is renowned for defending clients' interests in the most complex cases. He has obtained numerous acquittals and dismissals.
education: Master in Criminal Law and Criminology - Université de Yaoundé II
Training in international criminal law - The Hague

name: Barrister Sophie Ekotto
bio: Barrister Ekotto advises companies and employees in labor law. Her in-depth knowledge of the Cameroonian Labor Code and her experience in negotiation make her a reference in her field.
education: Master 2 in Social Law - Université de Yaoundé II
Advanced Studies Diploma in Labor Law - Université de Douala
Certification in social mediation - ILO Geneva

name: Barrister David Tchoumba
bio: A recognized specialist in tax law, Barrister Tchoumba assists companies with tax optimization and represents them in disputes with the tax authorities.
education: Master in Tax Law - Université de Yaoundé II
Higher Studies Diploma in International Taxation - HEC Paris

name: Barrister Grace Njoya
bio: Barrister Njoya specializes in alternative dispute resolution. She is an accredited arbitrator with several international arbitration institutions.
education: Master in International Arbitration - Université Paris 2 Panthéon-Assas
LLM in International Commercial Law - Queen Mary University London
